Instance Method# ReleasePMAssertion

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
kern_return_t ReleasePMAssertion(uint64_t assertionID);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/DriverKit/IOService/ReleasePMAssertion#parameters)

`assertionID`The assertion ID returned by CreatePMAssertion.

## [Return Value](/documentation/DriverKit/IOService/ReleasePMAssertion#return-value)

kIOReturnSuccess on success. See IOReturn.h for error codes.

## [Discussion](/documentation/DriverKit/IOService/ReleasePMAssertion#discussion)

Release a previously created power management assertion.
